title: Black Bean Co.
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Billed as an "energy food" and health food restaurant, this company has several locations in SC; this one is near downtown. Offers breakfast pastries and coffee, various wraps, gyros, and salads.
